short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online playground for CoffeeScript, CSS, and HTML

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
★ Develop web applications faster with real-time preview and code completion
★ Start coding immediately without having to set up a boilerplate HTML file
★ View the compiled JavaScript side-by-side
★ Quickly convert JavaScript snippets to CoffeeScript with built-in converter
★ Documentation panel is loaded for quick reference if window is wide enough
